alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 4:11AM MDT until October 18 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Fort Collins, Castle Rock, Greeley, and Byers. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps to protect tender plants from the cold. Move them indoors or cover with blankets and newspapers. Drain above ground sprinkler systems to prevent broken water lines.
